doc.goal: Attract deer and rabbits to your back yard.
doc.sol1: Plant hostas, tulips,  peas, soybeans, turnips, alfalfa, sorghum, kale, or corn.
doc.sol2: Plant daffodils, foxglove, poppies, thyme and lavender

doc.goal: How can I keep my garbage disposal blades sharp and in good repair?
doc.sol1: Once a month add 6 metal washers into your disposal and turn it on and wash it away, this will sharpen and clean the garbage disposal.
doc.sol2: Once a month add 6 ice cubes into your disposal and turn it on and wash it away, this will sharpen and clean the garbage disposal.
doc.query:
Goal: How can I keep my garbage disposal blades sharp and in good repair?
Answer:
choices: Once a month add 6 metal washers into your disposal and turn it on and wash it away, this will sharpen and clean the garbage disposal.
Once a month add 6 ice cubes into your disposal and turn it on and wash it away, this will sharpen and clean the garbage disposal.
